text: Jüri Ratas (born 2 July 1978) is an Estonian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Estonia from 2016 until 2021. He has been the Leader of the Centre Party since 2016.https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-08-16/nationalist-targeting- police-chief-has-estonia-staring-at-crisis ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Estonia Category:Politicians from Tallinn
title: Jüri Ratas
